Name: The Havens
Description: The Havens is a proto-state in the BattleTech universe, comprising systems such as Porthos and Santander.  Emerging after the Ferris Rebellion when the Ghost Bears opted to return Santander and Porthos to the inheritors, The Havens is known for its strategic positioning and the unique challenges it presents to neighboring factions.
ReputationStatements: The Havens do not welcome you, Commander, and I would see you gone if it were up to me. Yet, even in distaste, necessity rules. Prove yourself with this task if you wish to start repairing your reputation.
You have brought harm to The Havens, Commander, but grudges can only last so long. Help us with this mission, and we can find common ground through success.
The Havens respects warriors of skill, Commander. Let us set aside differences and forge profit from your strength through this contract.
Greetings, Commander. The Havens rarely calls for outside assistance, but your expertise suits a unique task that demands your attention.
Welcome back, Commander. Your proven reliability brings another opportunity. Take a look at this contract. I believe you'll find it beneficial.
Commander, The Havens appreciates your hand in our shared victories. We offer you this new target, knowing your skill will bring another success.
Come, friend of The Havens. We have an honorable task for you—another step to greatness that will bring glory and prosperity to us both.
MissionSuccessStatements: You've proven yourself a mighty ally of The Havens, Commander. Payment is already being transferred—another victory shared between us.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Commander, you completed part of the mission, and for that, you have earned partial payment. Next time, we hope to see a better outcome.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Commander, your failure is a disgrace to The Havens. Return only if you seek to redeem yourself.  Until then, you are no longer welcome here.
